item.description: The company said it plans to launch the new supercluster as soon as next year.

item.title: Here are five key takeaways from the Fed's big interest rate decision
item.description: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday delivered on a widely anticipated quarter percentage point interest rate cut.

item.title: Fed approves quarter-point interest rate cut and sees two more coming this year
item.description: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday released its decision on interest rates and updated its economic projections.

item.title: DoubleLine's Jeffrey Gundlach believes holding a 25% gold position isn't excessive
item.description: Gundlach's gold call is also partly based on his belief that inflation will stay stubbornly elevated because of the impact from tariffs.

item.title: Sales of heavy trucks are falling like the U.S. is headed for a recession
item.description: Heavy trucks sales have dropped to levels not seen in four years, according to the U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis.
